hero.title: Learn the Divine Art of the Begena
hero.subtitle: Timeless Melodies for the Modern Soul. Join our community and master King David's Harp with expert guidance.

mission.title: A Bridge to Sacred Sound
mission.paragraph1: Taodocos Begena is more than just a school; it is a mission to preserve and share the sacred tradition of the Begena. Our teaching is deeply rooted in the spiritual practices of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church, connecting each note to its purpose in prayer and meditation.
mission.paragraph2: We believe this timeless art should be accessible to everyone, no matter where they are. Through modern technology and a supportive community, we bring the ancient strings of King David's Harp to your fingertips, helping you find your own voice in this divine musical heritage.

about.title: Your Teacher & Guide
about.paragraph: I have been passionately playing and studying the Begena for over 10 years. Rooted in the timeless traditions of the Ethiopian Orthodox Church, my mission is to pass on this divine art to a new generation. I believe music is a prayer, and I am here to guide you on every step of your spiritual and musical journey.

features.title: Why Learn With Us?
features.expert_desc: Learn from seasoned Begena players with deep roots in traditional and spiritual music.
features.flexible_desc: We offer various time slots to fit your busy life. Learn at your own pace.
features.personalized_desc: Our individual plans are tailored to your unique skill level and learning goals.
features.community_desc: Join a group of fellow learners who share your passion for the Begena and its spiritual heritage.
